summary: The follow up to the cult classic horror film takes us back to the familiar shady surf city of Santa Carla, where vampire surfers quickly dispatch anyone who tries to invade their turf.
cast: Tad Hilgenbrink|Angus Sutherland|Autumn Reeser|Gabrielle Rose|Corey Feldman|Shaun Sipos|Merwin Mondesir|Kyle Cassie|Moneca Delain|Greyston Holt|Tom Savini|Daryl Shuttleworth|Sarah Smyth|P.J. Pesce|Alexander Calvert|Lindsay Maxwell|Karolina Turek|Ildiko Ferenczi|Jennifer Rostad|Gerald Paetz|Rikki Gagne|Lauren Gibson|Maja Aro|Corey Haim|Jamison Newlander|Evan Allen|Leah Beckingham
keywords: psychotronic film|vampire|vampire hunter|direct to video sequel to theatrical movie|lust
title: Jóvenes ocultos 2: Vampiros del surf
